Back to Stella Zhang New Venture Competition 2023









Tue, May 2, 2023
5 PM – 7 PM PDT (GMT-7)

 Registration 


Register







 Details


Topic: 

How to Pitch & Deal With Q&A
 
WORKSHOP OVERVIEW

Join us for the eighth and final workshop of the series! Teams competing in the final round of the New Venture Competition are required to pitch to judges on May 12th. Teams will give a 10-minute presentation followed by a 10-minute Q&A session. Learn more about what is expected and how to succeed.

If you have any questions regarding the presentation on May 13th, we encourage you to attend!

Complimentary appetizers and refreshments will be provided.


SCHEDULE

5:00 pm Check-In (Merage Atrium)

5:30 pm Workshop Begins (Merage Auditorium)

7:00 pm Workshop Ends – Mixer Begins (Merage Atrium)



There will be a Beall Bash Networking mixer following the workshop with appetizers and drinks!



Information and more FAQs about the competition can be found on our website here:

https://merage.uci.edu/research-faculty/centers/innovation-entrepreneurship/new-venture-competiton.html
